main event: A sighting of a diamond-shaped unidentified flying object with glowing red color and round lights was reported in Dallas, Texas on 16 May 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 4 to 5 seconds,The witness compared the size of the object to an F3 Cub Aircraft at an altitude of 6,000 to 8,000 feet,The object traveled at a speed estimated to be 3 to 4 times that of a jet trainer,The sighting occurred at night under bright moon and starlight conditions,No radar interception was reported at Love Field, Dallas during the time of the sighting.
sighted object: diamond-shaped glowing red object outlined with round lights
witness description: Former Agent for the Federal Bureau of Investigation, advised that credibility was good
